aka: Obscurantist and His Lineage or The Pyramids' Tearful Valleys

director.name: 卡雷尔·瓦切克 Karel Vachek

this_title: Tmář a jeho rod aneb Slzavé údolí pyramid
trans_title: Obscurantist and His Lineage or The Pyramids' Tearful Valleys
introduction: The most recent film-novel by the Czech classic film-maker, Karel Vachek, is on the subject of alien civilizations, who do not just live in the cosmos but on planet Earth itself.
chinese_title: Tmář a jeho rod aneb Slzavé údolí pyramid
